content: Edge AI Lab @ Yonsei UniversitySearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigation       Edge AI Lab  We are a research group focused on various aspects of AI/ML, aiming to fulfill diverse user demands at the edge (e.g., mobile and IoT devices). Grounded in theoretical and empirical foundations, we develop algorithms to make AI scalable, trustworthy, and efficient, addressing key challenges in the deployment of practical AI services. If you
